data.lyric:
[ti:It's The Most Wonderful Time O]
[ar:Andy Williams]
[al:The Andy Williams Christmas Al]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:07.37]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[00:12.42]
[00:14.35]With the kids jingle belling
[00:16.11]And everyone telling you "Be of good cheer"
[00:20.54]
[00:21.16]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[00:26.49]
[00:28.37]It's the hap-happiest season of all
[00:34.23]
[00:35.54]With those holiday greetings and gay happy meetings
[00:39.35]When friends come to call
[00:42.59]It's the hap- happiest season of all
[00:48.03]
[00:49.78]There'll be parties for hosting
[00:51.58]Marshmallows for toasting
[00:53.45]And caroling out in the snow
[00:56.64]There'll be scary ghost stories
[00:58.76]And tales of the glories of
[01:00.63]Christmases long  long ago
[01:03.38]
[01:05.55]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:10.74]
[01:12.74]There'll be much mistltoeing
[01:14.92]And hearts will be glowing
[01:16.86]When love ones are near
[01:19.22]
[01:19.85]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:27.41]
[01:35.21]There'll be parties for hosting
[01:36.27]Marshmallows for toasting
[01:38.20]And caroling out in the snow
[01:40.46]
[01:41.39]There'll be scary ghost stories
[01:43.14]And tales of the glories of
[01:45.44]Christmases long  long ago
[01:47.94]
[01:53.94]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:59.73]
[02:01.17]There'll be much mistltoeing
[02:02.54]And hearts will be glowing
[02:04.92]When love ones are near
[02:07.09]
[02:08.46]It's the most wonderful time
[02:11.02]
[02:11.64]It's the most wonderful time
[02:14.38]
[02:15.08]It's the most wonderful time of the year
data.trans:
[ti:It's The Most Wonderful Time O]
[ar:Andy Williams]
[al:The Andy Williams Christmas Al]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:07.37]这是一年中最好的时光
[00:14.35]孩子们唱着圣诞歌
[00:16.11]大家都对你送上祝福
[00:20.54]
[00:21.16]这是一年中最好的时光
[00:26.49]
[00:28.37]这是最快乐的季节
[00:34.23]
[00:35.54]人们走亲访友 送上节日问候
[00:39.35]宾朋满座
[00:42.59]这是最快乐的季节
[00:48.03]
[00:49.78]人们会举行派对
[00:51.58]人们会举杯祝福
[00:53.45]在雪中唱圣诞歌
[00:56.64]会讲恐怖的鬼故事
[00:58.76]还有很久以前 
[01:00.63]耶稣的荣耀故事
[01:03.38]
[01:05.55]这是一年中最好的时光
[01:10.74]
[01:12.74]你会看到很多槲寄生
[01:14.92]当爱人们在身边 
[01:16.86]你的心就会散发出爱的光芒
[01:19.22]
[01:19.85]这是一年中最好的时光
[01:27.41]
[01:35.21]人们会举行派对
[01:36.27]人们会举杯祝福
[01:38.20]在雪地里唱圣诞歌
[01:40.46]
[01:41.39]会讲恐怖的鬼故事
[01:43.14]还有很久以前 
[01:45.44]耶稣的荣耀故事
[01:47.94]
[01:53.94]这是一年中最好的时光
[01:59.73]
[02:01.17]你会看到很多槲寄生
[02:02.54]当爱人们在身边 
[02:04.92]你的心就会散发出爱的光芒
[02:07.09]
[02:08.46]这是一年中最好的时光
[02:11.02]
